nodes.title: Encode positive
widgets_values: A big cat running in the snow.

nodes.title: Final prompt preview
widgets_values: Anime-style video of a young woman with long, flowing black hair and cat ears, wearing a white kimono with blue floral patterns. She has large, fluffy white wings and a golden halo above her head. Her eyes are a striking blue, and she has a serene expression. The background is a dark, starry night sky with falling snowflakes. The woman is positioned in the center of the video, with a soft, glowing light illuminating her face and body. The style is detailed and realistic, with soft shading and highlights.The scene is captured in real-life footage.

nodes.title: Concatenate prompt
widgets_values: The scene is captured in real-life footage.
